sourcesContent:
export const questionObj = {"Qtext": "
 
Suppose it is given that
\[
	\frac{i ^3 + 3 ij ^2 }{3i ^2 j + j ^3 } = \frac{p ^3 + 3 pq ^2}{3 p ^2 q + q ^3}
\]
Then prove that 
\[
	\frac{p }{i } = \frac{q }{j }
\]
\newline

", "Steps": [{"id": "s1", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "It is given that
\[
	\frac{i ^3 + 3 ij ^2 }{3i ^2 j + j ^3 } = \frac{p ^3 + 3 pq ^2}{3 p ^2 q + q ^3}
\]"}, {"id": "s2", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
By using componendo and dividendo rule on both sides of the equation, we get
\begin{multline}\notag
	\\ \frac{i ^3 + 3 ij ^2 + 3i ^2 j + j ^3 }{i ^3 + 3 ij ^2 - 3i ^2 j - j ^3 } = \\
	\frac{p ^3 + 3 pq ^2 + 3 p ^2 q + q ^3}{p ^3 + 3 pq ^2 - 3 p ^2 q - q ^3} 
\end{multline}"}, {"id": "s3", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{(i + j )^3}{(i - j )^3} = \frac{(p + q )^3}{(p - q )^3}
\]"}, {"id": "s4", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{i + j }{i - j } = \frac{p + q }{p - q }
\]"}, {"id": "s5", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
Now apply componendo and dividendo on both sides of the equation again.
\[
	\frac{i }{j } = \frac{p }{q }
\]"}, {"id": "s6", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{p }{i } = \frac{q }{j }
\]"}, {"id": "s7", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
Hence proved.
\newline

"}]} 

 export const resp = [{"data": [], "text": " "}, {"data": [], "text": "Componendo and dividendo rule on the given equation will result in \begin{multline}\notag
	\\ \frac{i ^3 + 3 ij ^2 + 3i ^2 j + j ^3 }{i ^3 + 3 ij ^2 - 3i ^2 j - j ^3 } = \\
	\frac{p ^3 + 3 pq ^2 + 3 p ^2 q + q ^3}{p ^3 + 3 pq ^2 - 3 p ^2 q - q ^3} 
\end{multline}"}, {"data": [], "text": "$$\text{The previous equation can also be written as $\frac{(i + j )^3}{(i - j )^3} = \frac{(p + q )^3}{(p - q )^3}$, as $(a+b)^3 = a^3 + 3ab^2 + 3a^2b + b^3$ and $(a-b)^3 = a^3 + 3ab^2 - 3a^2b - b^3$, for any $a$ and $b$.}$$"}, {"data": [], "text": "$$\text{Upon taking cube root on both sides we get $\frac{i + j }{i - j } = \frac{p + q }{p - q }$}$$"}, {"data": [], "text": "$$\text{Upon applying componendo and dividendo we get $\frac{i }{j } = \frac{p }{q }$}$$"}, {"data": [], "text": "$$\text{Multiplying both sides by $\frac{q}{i}$, we get $\frac{p }{i } = \frac{q }{j }$"}, {"data": [], "text": " "}]
